result.execSummary:
The defendant Serra Angel Wahl was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Disorderly Conduct. This is not a criminal offense and results only in a money penalty for this offense.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Serra Angel Wahl

records.addlTxt: Dean Attorney Fees (submitted to Accts Payable 6/29/22; escrow applied to balance; Def invoiced for the remainder)

1:36 PM Defendant Serra Angel Wahl in court.  Attorney Amy Elizabeth Forehand in court for State of Wisconsin.  Attorney Julie A Dadoun in court for Serra Angel Wahl. Attorney Dadoun indicates that there is an agreement. Attorney Forehand moves to amend to 79.4 with a fine of $25 plus costs. Defendant enters a NC plea. So ordered with 60 dtp.
Jury selection on June 27, 2022 at 09:00 am.
Jury selection on June 27, 2022 at 09:00 am.
Final pre-trial on June 20, 2022 at 01:00 pm.

1:36 PM Defendant Serra Angel Wahl in court.  Attorney Amy Elizabeth Forehand in court for State of Wisconsin.  Attorney Julie A Dadoun in court for Serra Angel Wahl.  Attorney Dadoun has reviewed the complaint with her client and waives the formal reading, enters a NG plea. Court sets jury trial. Parties state that this will be a one day trial. Attorney Dadoun asks for a deadline for motions within 30 days. So ordered.

records.descr: Demand for Discovery and Inspection - Defendant

records.addlTxt: Adjourned initial appearance on April 13, 2022 at 01:00 pm.

09:12 AM Defendant Serra Angel Wahl appeared by video means. Prosecuting Atty Amy Elizabeth Forehand appeared for State of Wisconsin. SW hasn't received the complaint. Court resets. Defendant doesn't qualify for a public defender but has spoken with Dadoun.   

Court reviews financial information and appoints Attorney Dadoun. Defendant to deposit $50/month with the Clerk of Court starting on 03/01/22 . At the end of the case, counsel will file their bill and the Defendant will be required to fully reimburse Richland County. The Defendant will need to complete a payment plan form with the Clerk of Court.  Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for April 13, 2022 at 01:00 pm.
No contact whatsoever with the victim or victim's residence.

1:13 p.m. By Zoom. Appearances: ADA Forehand for the State, Def without counsel from the Richland County Jail. State requests $500 sig bond - no contact with the victim. Sealed victim key to be provided by DA. Court so orders. 2/23 at 9 a.m. for initial. Def to contact SPD.

records.descr: Conf disclosure of info to be sealed/redacted
